  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:ait.opetaja.ee:f2c9910085cb9536afbcd8abae9d8f4f06dee429</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>1</catalog>
            <entry>f2c9910085cb9536afbcd8abae9d8f4f06dee429</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="et">Lillekell</string>
            <string language="en">Flower clock</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blumetaktgeber</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Horloge de fleur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pulso de disparo da flor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orologio del fiore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρολόι λουλουδιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reloj de la flor</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">PowerPointis kujundatud õppematerjal, mille käigus on lastel võimalik vaadelda loodusfotosid ja tutvuda looduse rütmiga ehk kuidas lillede järgi saab kellaaega määrata. Esitlus aitab 6-7-aastastel lastel arendada vaatlemist ja uurimist.</string>
            <string language="en">Study material in PowerPoint. Children can watch nature photos and get acquainted with the rhythm of nature or how to know time with the help of flowers. Presentation helps 6-7 year old children to develop research and observation skills.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Loodus</string>
            <string language="et">Taimed</string>
            <string language="en">Basic Education</string>
            <string language="en">Nature</string>
            <string language="en">Plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studie Material in PowerPoint. Kinder 
können Naturfotos überwachen und mit dem Rhythmus der Natur bekannt 
erhalten oder, wie man Zeit mit Hilfe der Blumen kennt. 
Darstellung hilft den 6-7 Einjahreskindern, Forschung und 
Beobachtung Fähigkeiten zu entwickeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matériel d'étude dans PowerPoint. Les 
enfants peuvent observer des photos de nature et devenir au courant du
rythme de la nature ou comment savoir le temps avec l'aide des fleurs.
La présentation aide les enfants âgés de 6-7 ans à 
développer des qualifications de recherches et d'observation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Material do estudo em PowerPoint. As 
crianças podem prestar atenção a fotos da natureza e começá-las 
familiares com o ritmo da natureza ou como saber o tempo com a ajuda 
das flores. A apresentação ajuda a crianças velhas de 6-7 
anos desenvolver habilidades da pesquisa e da observação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Materiale di studio in PowerPoint. I bambini
possono guardare le foto della natura ed ottenere al corrente del 
ritmo della natura o come conoscere il tempo con l'aiuto dei fiori. 
La presentazione aiuta i bambini di 6-7 anni a sviluppare le 
abilità di osservazione e di ricerca.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υλικό μελέτης σε PowerPoint. Τα παιδιά 
μπορούν να προσέξουν τις φωτογραφίες φύσης και να εξοικειωθούν με
το ρυθμό της φύσης ή πώς να ξέρουν το χρόνο με τη βοήθεια των 
λουλουδιών. Η παρουσίαση βοηθά τα ηλικίας παιδιά 6-7 
ετών για να αναπτύξει τις δεξιότητες έρευνας και παρατήρησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Material del estudio en PowerPoint. Los 
niños pueden mirar las fotos de la naturaleza y conseguir conocidos 
con el ritmo de la naturaleza o cómo saber tiempo con la ayuda de las
flores. La presentación ayuda a viejos niños de 6-7 años a 
desarrollar habilidades de la investigación y de la observación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Natur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Usines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Natureza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plantas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
